website_summaries.verdict: A heavy-duty, two-in-one grill. Cook with either gas or charcoal, though gas is handier due to the interior construction of the grill plates. With its versatility, rugged build, and spacious surfaces, it tops our list.
pros: Durable design doubles as both a gas and charcoal grill
Gas feature provides optimal heat control and even grilling
Charcoal side is easy to light
Huge cook surface for grilling in volume
cons: Charcoal function may be somewhat less user-friendly than the gas feature because grill plates sit close to the coals and aren't adjustable
Some issues of rust around the hinges
At 110 pounds, it's a bit heavy

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: A very nice grill. The instructions consisted of pictures. I've used it several times with charcoal and gas. It's very convenient using the gas to light the charcoal. The downside is the coals are close to the grill plates. You also cannot adjust the distance from the coals.When cooking meat that needed slower cooking. I compensated by searing then using indirect heat on one side of the grill plus using smoking chips to get the flavor I like. The gas worked really well.
customer_reviews.author: jenjay1

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Bought the girll in April2017. Used it during the summer only, and always cover the gril. As of today the aluminum pan that is located under the burners rusted through and there is a big opening under it. Furthermore, grates are rusting. For what I payed for the grill I was hoping to get more than a year out of it. Will be contacting manufacture.
customer_reviews.author: Marzanna

customer_reviews.title: I'm content
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill. My only complaint is the charcoal pan is to close to the rack so stuff cooks really fast or burns. I don't use that part of it because of it ruining the food. Don't buy the cover that is at the bottom that says "most people buys these together" double check first and make it's the 3-4 burner cover the 2-3 is a tight fit and isn't quite long enough.
customer_reviews.author: angie r.

customer_reviews.title: The charcoal pan doesn't last
customer_reviews.text: The charcoal pan doesn't last more than a year, and it seems unavailable for replacement. The side burner is nearly useless due to the lack of power. Overall, it's okay because I bought it when it was $200 something. I would give 1 start with the current price $400 something.
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: I love the ease of lighting the charcoal with the propane ...
customer_reviews.text: I love the ease of lighting the charcoal with the propane burners, but it can be a little difficult controlling the temperature once you are running on coals. I've had it outside for a few months now in heavy rain, and there is no rust. I might buy another charcoal tray for this to just have it on hand, because that feels like it will be the first/only part to give up the ghost.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: I don’t like the big gap it has in the back which ...
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the big gap it has in the back which lets all the heat out. It takes much longer to cook anything compared to my old grill.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Good value.
customer_reviews.text: A lot of work to assemble the bbq, but once together, it’s working well. Price is good for this bbq and it offers some good features. Only complaint so far, is access to the gas bottle tap, which requires that you reach right round the back of the unit to turn the gas on and off. And the plastic wheels were very poor quality so I had to replace those with Home Depot units soon after purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Summertime is now going to be awesome with this beautiful grill
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grill. Product came well packed but UPS mishandled it while en route. I give UPS as usual 2 stars BUT Char broil gets the top 5 star for excellent American based customer support who replaced my damaged swingaway tray effortlessly. A note to those who build this grill on their own, do not tighten all nuts until the two side trays are in place because the holes can only line up with the lengthwise tubes loose - finger threaded. Once the trays are in place with bolts, then go back and tighten up all remaining nuts and bolts. This way your assembly will be strong and firm.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill I have Owned!!!
customer_reviews.text: Best grill I have owned! Product arrived on time and was not damaged at all. It was easy to assemble and beautifully built! I really love the ease of converting to charcoal to get the charcoal fire flavor on the food. I also love the convenience of a gas grill, when I get back from work tired and need to grill some food. Very easy to clean up as well.
customer_reviews.author: Ezra Uzosike

customer_reviews.title: Love this grill
customer_reviews.text: Love this grill! Only takes a few minutes to heat up the coals, and the coals last a while once you shut off the burners. I worked it with just gas and the porcelain grates worked great. Only downside is I paid about $40 over what Lowes had (non sale price).
customer_reviews.author: Ross Family

customer_reviews.title: Happy grill Master
customer_reviews.text: Love the Grill. Use it alll the time, With the exception of the mouse who made it's hom in the grill, Toik a few days to get rid of the mouse, My daughter put it together, She cooks on it nearly every day,
customer_reviews.author: M Siverly

customer_reviews.title: Good grill over all
customer_reviews.text: Love being able to use coal or gas. Easy to switch. You can even cook with gas, but use a little coal for flavor. It would be nice to be able to close off air for slow cooking with coal, but over all. it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Michael G.

customer_reviews.title: Gas to coal BBQ
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this barbecue because it was a gas to coal grill. The three burners are big enough for us. Heats up fast and stays at the temperature. Was easy for one persons to assemble, took about a hour and a half. Don’t be afraid to purchase this grill. You won’t be sorry
customer_reviews.author: anyatot

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my husband's birthday. He was very impressed. It took us awhile to put together, but you really only put together the cart. It's nothing complicated. The propane feature works great. We've used it a ton, and that's from a pure charcoal man.
customer_reviews.author: Fran

customer_reviews.title: No good
customer_reviews.text: Don't like it burns more in the back of the grill doesn't burn even charcoal only last 20 min at the most
customer_reviews.author: JOEL

customer_reviews.title: Try it with lava rock!!
customer_reviews.text: We absolutely love this grill! I'm a propane man and my husband is a charcoal fan. This gives us both! No poisonous lighter fluid with grill! We have recently added lava rock to the tray for flavorizing our meat with a second tray for when we want mesquite charcoal. The best grill we can imagine owning. A must buy! The Inclan's
customer_reviews.author: Michael Lee

customer_reviews.title: Difficult to regulate temp with coals
customer_reviews.text: Coals set really close to grill , makes hard to get that good taste of wood charcoal with out burning meat . I just put charcoal around out side and try to cook in center . If you want to slow cook you will have to use snake method, but even then it’s hard to regulate temperature the way it’s designed.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Huycke

customer_reviews.title: Great value, very well made, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I typically don’t take the time to post reviews, but this product is so excellently manufactured and easy to assemble and use that I thought it worthy of a great review. I am rarely impressed with products, and in this case I am completely happy with this grill. It’s everythin I had hoped it would be. Recommend most highly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great BBQ
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill!! I use lava rock instead of charcoal, and it tastes great. Its also very sturdy and well made!!
customer_reviews.author: kathy trosclair

customer_reviews.title: gift
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a birthday gift for my son. He's assembled it, set it in place, and is waiting for the weather to become more favorable to use it. It's very well made and he is excited about preparing our first meal using it. I'll let you know his final assessment once that happens. (won't happen in the snow, ice, etc.)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth effort to assemble!
customer_reviews.text: Great customer service replaced damaged parts quickly. Hard for me to assemble, but worth the effort! Works fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Robert Cullen Doyle II

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my husband, and he loves it!!! He uses it once a week and has recommended it to friends.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: My best buy this year. Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: A couple of hours to assemble. I’ve had worst ones from Costco. Worth the wait though. Awesome, burns hot! Seering is no problem. Loving it. Big Bang for low cost and footprint. Have not tried coals yet. Good I’ve had many gas BBQ’s in the past. This is my favorite. Very sturdy a good looking too.
customer_reviews.author: KOwebsites

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: This grill not only functions amazingly, it looks amazing as well, the function that it's charcoal and propane is so convenient.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best Grill I've ever had
customer_reviews.text: This is the best grill I have ever had, and I've gone through a few. It gives you the convenience of gas but with the use and flavor of charcoal and wood chips is a single push of a button. I am already looking for the upgrade to this grill for when I want this version in a larger size. I got Amazon's service to put it together so in my opinion assembly was a breeze 😉
customer_reviews.author: Tara E.

customer_reviews.title: I love it.
customer_reviews.text: I used it in both methods. Gas and charcoal. So far so good. It heats up really fast. Cleaning was easy. The 1st Time I used the charcoal I had to stick a metal spoon on the grill to raise it farther from the coals. The 2nd time I put less coals and worked great.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamed K

customer_reviews.title: Best grill ever.
customer_reviews.text: I love this grill. The build took about 3 hours lots of garbage and it came in a huge brown box (grill came a little dented). There is a lot of screws and if you have fat fingers it's difficult to screw them in because they go into tight spaces. But in general easy build. When I was done i connected the tank added coals and went to grill. Food came out amazing but had to cook the food quick.because the coals are close to the food ( not a deal breaker). All in all solid grill I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Big vic

customer_reviews.title: Great grill
customer_reviews.text: We bought this awhile ago and it's doing very well. No issues! We love that it's easy to control as we have to keep it on the porch. The side burner is also such a great accessory. (Baked beans corn on the cob? Must have with grilled foods)
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Grill, BEST BUY EVER !!!
customer_reviews.text: We love the grill. Having the abilities to grill with charcoal, just gas or using the burner is phenomenal. Best Buy ever!!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Sales

customer_reviews.title: I like the option to do both
customer_reviews.text: It works for what I need. I like the option to do both, but I have noticed rusting after a year, even with using the Char Broil large cover.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Estrabillo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent grill and price
customer_reviews.text: Excellent grill and price. Would have given 5 star if it had front access to gas tank. Still very happy with it.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Harden

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Grill!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome!! I used it for about two weeks and this thing really makes awesome food! It’s easy to assemble and it lights up instantly! I’m so glad I chose Char-Broil for my barbecue experience. I LOVE IT.
customer_reviews.author: AJ

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: great grill at a great price. i have 2 of these now
customer_reviews.author: C. S. Prosser III

customer_reviews.title: The only grill you need.
customer_reviews.text: Best grill, so flexible, charcoal, gas and smoke chips. Although is not advertised to be used as a smoker, it's very easy and practical to smoke food in here. Easy clean beautiful look.
customer_reviews.author: paolo andres

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: what an awesome grill - simply love it - take your time for the assembly process
customer_reviews.author: W. T.

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: It does take a long time to put together but it's a great grill. Heavy duty. My husband loves it!
customer_reviews.author: angelacez

customer_reviews.title: We LOVE this grill
customer_reviews.text: We LOVE this grill. It really does do both really well. Only thing was a missing piece to make the side burner work but we've been putting off worrying about that because the regular grill is so excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product. Did not require any other fluid to ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product. Did not require any other fluid to lit the coal, it worked as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Have fun with it
customer_reviews.text: I liked the amount of heat it puts out and how fast it get hot. Easy to use. I like it so well I bought 3 one for each house and a back up in case the modal get discontinued
customer_reviews.author: Jim Henderson

customer_reviews.title: Shipped with damage
customer_reviews.text: Nice grill but it came with a ship on the top part of the cover very visible and a dent on the front face. Emailed vendor never heard from them. Assembly is a pain on the neck.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: Easy to assemble (though quite a few steps), and it's been great. Have used it regularly for a few months of grilling and it's very easy to fire up, use, and clean.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Everything works as it should. Pretty easy to put together if you are minimally handy.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Buckley

customer_reviews.title: it works great! We use it all the time
customer_reviews.text: Extremely difficult and complicated to put together, but once you put in the hard work of getting it together, it works great! We use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Traveling Songbird

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great grill great value .. Got it delivered complete nothing missing
customer_reviews.author: juan

customer_reviews.title: Bad customer service with charbroil
customer_reviews.text: The wheels broke on 5th time using. Getting a hold of customer service was impossible.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth all the effort!
customer_reviews.text: First...this item comes completely disassembled. You will need to have two people working on it so when one of you becomes frustrated the other can forge ahead...only to storm off later in the approx 3 hour assembly process. Once it's put together, it's awesome. Seriously, it's a great grill for the cost. Once it IS put together it feels sturdy. The lid is solid. The side burner is actually quite stable and a great flame, though I have never every used the side burner. I'm sure it's fantastic. I am happy to have purchased and would certainly do so again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put together, looking forward to using charcoal option.
customer_reviews.author: Richard J. Bourque

customer_reviews.title: The grill looks nice. Well built
customer_reviews.text: The grill looks nice. Well built. It was relatively easy to assemble. The one complaint that I have is that the charcoal tray was delivered damaged.
customer_reviews.author: Rabi Shamas

customer_reviews.title: Already?? seriously!?
customer_reviews.text: We’ve used this maybe 10 times.. burners are already clogged. Will not properly heat up / grill! Pissed!
customer_reviews.author: Charles

customer_reviews.title: Short 4hr assembley.
customer_reviews.text: Went together as easy as following the directions,, (pictures), Not for the faint of heart, this aircraft maintenance supervisor did skip a step, but the mid-shelf went in just fine. believe the 115 lbs as it is heavy, sturdy and should last a long life time. Haven't fired it up yet but looking forward to the weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Patty

customer_reviews.title: Good product, but the real review will be three ...
customer_reviews.text: Good product, but the real review will be three or four years from now when I find out how well the parts hold up
customer_reviews.author: frank dry

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Great bbq for a great price! Just be prepared to spend some time assembling this product
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Like it better than gas. Used gas to fire it up. Works great.
customer_reviews.author: Cyndi Tourville

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love that it can go from gas to charcoal in no time.
customer_reviews.author: John Dezelich

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Charcoal and gas grill in one! My husband is thrilled. Me too. We live at 8500 ft in the mountains and thought charcoal was gone forever. Not any more. Assembled this himself in an afternoon (it takes some time) and it works great. Love it. And the price is unbeatable. Free shipping. Amazing.
customer_reviews.author: Suze

customer_reviews.title: Couldn’t ask for better!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this grill! Best of both worlds. Easy to put together and grills amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer T

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: Once put together, this BBQ cooks meat evenly...let's you control temp quite well, and has quality grills of cast-iron...make sure you wipe the entire inside with cooking oil and "season" it...the grills especially.
customer_reviews.author: 2Dogs1Name

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very satisfied! Everything went together and have enjoyed cooking out this year!
customer_reviews.author: lsnider37

customer_reviews.title: Good quality. It takes a bit to assemble it ...
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. It takes a bit to assemble it but it's easy. The grill does a great job, easy to clean and to operate.
customer_reviews.author: tbausch

customer_reviews.title: Damaged on arrival
customer_reviews.text: Received the box and it looked like it was tumbled through a dryer. Yep, turns out the materials are bent.
customer_reviews.author: AUAlum1998

customer_reviews.title: Damaged product
customer_reviews.text: I finally received product and it was dented very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: and it was fantastic! The whole family complimented how nice of a ...
customer_reviews.text: Put this together with minor difficulty yesterday, used it last night with the gas...and it was fantastic! The whole family complimented how nice of a grill it was.
customer_reviews.author: lynn

customer_reviews.title: This is a very nice unit. Easy to clean and can handle volume ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a very nice unit. Easy to clean and can handle volume - five boneless pork chops 2 inches thick, eight brats, eight chicken hot dogs, eight Beddar Cheddars and four half pound hamburgers.
customer_reviews.author: Rock

customer_reviews.title: They say it's good. Nice size and good quality
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift. They say it's good. Nice size and good quality. Coals a little too close to burner.
customer_reviews.author: Jane Dobrovolny

customer_reviews.title: Terrible!!
customer_reviews.text: Terrible!!!! We were so excited to try and sure enough it showed up with box open....then as we are putting together found bent and damaged parts...nice considering it was well priced!!! Meaning not cheap! Have to use have a lot of people depending upon it for the holiday!
customer_reviews.author: patti

customer_reviews.title: Good, with only one simple problem
customer_reviews.text: Works very well, but the cast iron grates had to be ground off at the sides (a little off each of 3 grates) to make them fit within the available space. Patience and a good grinder solved the problem.
customer_reviews.author: David Dugdale

product_meta.title: Char-Broil Gas2Coal 3-Burner Liquid Propane and Charcoal Hybrid Grill
product_meta.description: Style:GrillWith the Char-Broil Gas2Coal, you can easily switch from a gas grill to a charcoal grill in under 60 seconds, without the use of tools. Enjoy the speed and convenience of grilling with gas, or savor the signature flavors of cooking over charcoal, both on one grill.
feature_bullets: Quickly and easily converts from a gas grill to charcoal grill without tools.
Enjoy the speed and convenience of grilling with gas. Get the signature flavors of cooking over charcoal. Do both on one grill.
Durable stainless steel burners provide longevity and porcelain-coated cast-iron cooking grates are easy to clean.
40,000-BTU's spread across three main burners and one 12,000-BTU side burner.
540 square inch total cooking area- 420 square inch primary cooking area and 120 square inch warming rack.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.1 out of 5 stars157 ratings4.1 out of 5 stars
